channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Top YouTube app for Android TV compromised to serve malware - here's what we know, and how to stay safe
item.description: SmartTube suffered a major breach that introduced hidden background code, triggering community alarm, Play Protect warnings, and urgent calls for caution.

item.title: Can AI Look at Your Retina and Diagnose Alzheimer’s? Eric Topol Hopes So
item.description: The author of Super Agers believes AI could bring big changes to the world of medicine.

item.title: The godfather speaks - this is the device Linus Torvalds says would be his perfect Linux PC, but you'll never get one
item.description: Linus Torvald’s new PC build highlights his preference for reliable hardware, strong kernel compatibility, and quiet high-performance components chosen for serious development work.

item.title: The 'truth serum' for AI: OpenAI’s new method for training models to confess their mistakes
item.description: OpenAI researchers have introduced a novel method that acts as a "truth serum" for large language models (LLMs), compelling them to self-report their own misbehavior, hallucinations and policy violations. This technique, "confessions," addresses a growing concern in enterprise AI: Models can be dishonest, overstating their confidence or covering up the shortcuts they take to arrive at an answer. For real-world applications, this technique evolves the creation of more transparent and steerable AI systems.What are confessions?Many forms of AI deception result from the complexities of the reinfor...

item.title: Exclusive: 20 years in, this OG YouTube channel is opening a new studio to support its growth
item.description: Smosh’s new office will support the growth the growth it’s seen since its original founders returned to the helm in 2023. Twenty years ago, not too long after Youtube itself launched, Ian Hecox and Anthony Padilla started uploading videos to the platform. What started as two teenagers trying to make each other laugh turned into the biggest channel on YouTube. It was the first ever to reach 10 million subscribers. Eventually Smosh was acquired by a company called Defy Media. The company would expand rapidly–more videos, more cast members, even a movie–but then came turmoil and uncertainty for ...

item.title: Feds ask Waymo about robotaxis repeatedly passing school buses in Austin
item.description: The agency already opened an investigation in October over Waymo's performance around school buses. Waymo said it issued a software update to its fleet to improve performance.

item.title: Micro1, a Scale AI competitor, touts crossing $100M ARR
item.description: Micro1 started the year with roughly $7 million ARR. Now, it claims to have surpassed $100 million in ARR, double what it reported in September.

item.title: Apple announces even more major executive turnover
item.description: Following the recent retirement of former COO Jeff Williams, AI chief John Giannandrea stepping down, and the departure of head of design Alan Dye for Meta, Apple announced Thursday that environmental and policy lead Lisa Jackson is retiring and that Jennifer Newstead will replace Kate Adams as the company’s general counsel after Adams retires “late […]...

item.title: This ‘Sinners’ Star Knew You’d Have Feelings About That Grace Scene
item.description: Li Jun Li and Ryan Coogler had a chat about how audiences might hate Grace for her climactic decision in 'Sinners.'

item.title: Newly-discovered $1.5 billion lithium deposit could revolutionize the tech industry - but bad news, it's inside a supervolcano
item.description: Researchers discovered massive lithium-rich clay in the McDermitt Caldera, offering a potential multi-trillion-dollar supply for batteries and industry.

item.title: Apple’s executive shake-up continues with departures of general counsel and policy head
item.description: Apple loses two more top senior executives with exits of longtime general counsel Kate Adams and environmental VP Lisa Jackson. Meta’s Jennifer Newstead is set to join as new general counsel in 2026.

item.title: Nintendo’s Switch 2 Mario Kart bundle is on sale at Amazon again for $50 off
item.description: One of the biggest surprises of Cyber Monday was the terrific discount we saw on the Nintendo Switch 2 Mario Kart World bundle, which dropped in price by $50. We expected the price to return to normal once the shopping holiday ended, but to our surprise, it’s still going strong two days later. Several major […]

item.title: Ritz Cracker Sandwiches Recalled in 8 States for Undeclared Peanut Butter
item.description: Bad news for people with peanut allergies.

item.title: Cloudflare Has Blocked 416 Billion AI Bot Requests Since July 1
item.description: Cloudflare CEO Matthew Prince claims the internet infrastructure company’s efforts to block AI crawlers are already seeing big results.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 gets a new story trailer teasing the playable Dark Angels faction ahead of its 2026 launch
item.description: Deep Silver and King Art Games have shared a new story trailer for Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4, teasing an epic campaign and the playable Dark Angels faction.

item.title: Over 70 US banks and credit unions affected by Marquis ransomware breach - here's what we know
item.description: Marquis was struck with ransomware and allegedly even paid the demand.

item.title: Looking to supercharge your Raspberry Pi? This adapter provides two full-sized HDMI ports and a PCIe connector - and it only costs $10
item.description: The $10 Waveshare adapter expands Raspberry Pi 5 connectivity through dual HDMI support and a functional PCIe M.2 slot.

item.title: Watch Phineas and Ferb recap Percy Jackson and the Olympians Season 1
item.description: "Percy Jackson and the Olympians" Season 1 gets a quick recap courtesy of Phineas and Ferb.

item.title: Pentagon’s Signalgate report finds Pete Hegseth violated military policies
item.description: It has been months since a group of Trump administration officials put together a Signal group chat to discuss classified military intelligence ahead of a military strike in Yemen while inadvertently adding a journalist, and now the Pentagon’s inspector general has released its report on the mess. The results of Steven Stebbins’ eight-month-long investigation found […]...

item.title: Anthropic’s Daniela Amodei Believes the Market Will Reward Safe AI
item.description: The Trump administration might think regulation is killing the AI industry, but Anthropic president Daniela Amodei disagrees.

item.title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms trailer promises epic Westerosi jousting action
item.description: "A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms," based on George R.R. Martin's "The Hedge Knight," premieres Jan. 18 on HBO and HBO Max.

item.title: Shingles Vaccine Doesn’t Just Lower Dementia Risk, It Could Also Help Treat It
item.description: New research finds the shingles vaccine can potentially provide broad protection against dementia.

item.title: ‘Andor’ Can’t Be the End of Good ‘Star Wars’
item.description: This year marked the end of a new era of 'Star Wars' and hopefully gave the franchise its blueprint for the future.

item.title: Looks Like We Can Finally Kiss the Metaverse Goodbye
item.description: It appears Meta's Horizon Worlds may literally and figuratively not have legs after all.

item.title: Bending Spoons continues its spree of buying famous tech brands with the Eventbrite deal
item.description: Bending Spoons buys Eventbrite for $500 million, aiming to revive growth using operational changes, pricing strategies, and product enhancements.

item.title: This tiny white tower packs an RTX 5060 GPU and a Ryzen 9 8945HX CPU, but looks nothing like a mini PC
item.description: Minisforum AtomMan G1 Pro mini PC pairs a mobile-class flagship CPU with a desktop GPU inside a narrow chassis, pushing cooling limits hard.

item.title: Game in style with almost 50% off this 31.5-inch MSI Curved Gaming Monitor
item.description: This MSI is a cheap full HD curved gaming monitor with a high refresh rate and low response time.
